page.title: 15 EDUCATION.
page.content: In our area there are 6 Primary Schools. Only 2 of these have nursery units. The age range in Yeo Valley Primary School is 3 to 11. There are 311 children in the school now. It was opened in 1976. It is an old school but it has modern classrooms. Forches Cross Primary School was opened in 1955. They have 335 pupils ranging between 3 and 11 years, in 12 classrooms with 12 teachers. Most of children live on Forches estate. Ashleigh C of E Primary School was opened in 1976 in older school premises.There are 326 children aged between 5 and 11 years in 11 classes with 11 full time teachers and 1 part time teacher.
